Source: element/element-selector.js

 /**
 * Element
 * @private
 * @class
 * @memberof EAM.Element
 * @param {EAM.Eam} eam
 * @param {EAM.Node} node
 * @param {EAM.Element.Options} options Initial configuration.
 */
function ElementSelector(eam, node, options){

	/** 
	* Get CSS selector path
	* @returns {String} 
	*/
	this.path = function(){ return path(false); }

	/** 
	* Get CSS selector
	* @returns {String} 
	* @todo should we use? if( node.disabled == true ) selector +=':disabled';
	* @todo should we use? if( $(node).css('opacity') != 1) selector +=':opacity';
	*/
	this.tag = function(){ return path(true); }

	/**
     * Get CSS Path
     * @private
     * @returns {String}
     */
	function path(last) {

		return "path:last("+last+")";

		//todo: rewrite
	    var $node = eam.$(node), path;
	    while ($node.length) {
	        var realNode = $node[0], 
	        	name = realNode.localName || realNode.tagName;
	        if (!name) break;
	        name = name.toLowerCase();
	        if (name=='input' && realNode.type) {
	        	name += '[type="'+realNode.type+'"]';
	        }if (realNode.id) {
	            var name = name + '#' + realNode.id;
	            if(last!=true) name = name + (path ? '>' + path : '');
	            return name;
	        } else if (realNode.name) {
	            name += '[name="'+realNode.name+'"]';
	        }else if (realNode.className) {
	            name += '.' + [].slice.call(realNode.classList).join('.');
	        }
	        if(last) return name;
	        var $parent = $node.parent(), $siblings = $parent.children(name);
	        if ($siblings.length > 1) name += ':eq(' + $siblings.index($node) + ')';
	        path = name + (path ? '>' + path : '');
	        $node = $parent;
	    }
	    if(path==window.undefined) throw 'err';
	    return path;
	}
}

module.exports = ElementSelector;
